title: Ticket #7714: SYSTEM_PERIODIC_[HOLD|REMOVE|RELEASE] hard to use, compose
description:
The CE, and other users, are making extensive use of the SYSTEM_PERIODIC_* expressions, but the expressions are getting harder to work with because of the multiple parallel clauses.

So let's borrow the approach from SUBMIT_REQUIREMENTS and have names. e.g., 

SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_NAMES = CONDITION_A, CONDITION_B
SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CONDITION_A = User == "gthain"
SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CONDITION_A_REASON = "Greg Thain runs too many jobs."
SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CONDITION_B = RequestMemory > 1024M
SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CONDITION_B_REASON = "Small-memory jobs only, please."
